forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a gentle warmth illuminating the city, even as a persistent breeze carries with it whispers of the sea. The sun casts a gentle golden hue upon the streets, its presence fluctuating with the persistent dance of clouds overhead. Highs flirt with the mid-sixties, providing a pleasing backdrop for those venturing outside. Yet, the swift winds, gusting at times, remind us of the city’s character; a kind of lively tumult that invigorates the atmosphere.

As the evening approaches, the clouds will thicken, bringing a cooler embrace as temperatures dip softly towards the low fifties. While remnants of marine layer may linger, they are not so dense as to obscure the city’s vibrant life. For those planning to meander through the urban landscape, light layers are advisable. A light jacket will serve well against the evening chill, especially for a leisurely stroll to savor the sights and sounds of the bustling streets. Perhaps one might opt for a cozy café, savoring a warm drink while watching day slip into night, as the lights of the city begin to twinkle against the backdrop of a deepening sky.
